mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM users order by userid ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{pasesize} ) where rn between (#{page}-1)*#{pasesize} + 1 AND #{page} * #{pasesize}
mapper.update: UPDATE users Set usernm = #{usernm} , pass = #{pass} , reg_dt = #{reg_dt} , alias = #{alias} , addr1 = #{addr1} , addr2 = #{addr2} , zipcode = #{zipcode} WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into users(userid , usernm , pass , reg_dt , alias , addr1 , addr2 , zipcode ) values (#{userid} , #{usernm} , #{pass} , #{reg_dt} , #{alias} , #{addr1} , #{addr2} , #{zipcode} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where userid = #{data}
